characterDescription.skinTone: fair skin with subtle pink undertones, especially on cheeks and around the nose. Skin appears slightly translucent, revealing faint blue veins under the eyes. Even complexion overall.
characterDescription.eyeColor: bright sky blue eyes with slight greyish-blue outer ring and darker limbal ring. No visible flecks or variations in color.
characterDescription.eyeShape: large, almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned at the outer corners, giving a gentle expression. Average-length eyelashes.
characterDescription.hairColor: medium chestnut brown hair with subtle natural highlights, particularly around the face. Hair appears slightly lighter at the ends.
characterDescription.hairTexture: slightly wavy with loose, fine curls, especially around the face and hairline. Hair has medium thickness and some flyaways.
characterDescription.hairStyle: hair styled in two high pigtail buns on either side of the head. Each bun is secured with a pink clip with a white pom-pom. A few loose strands frame the face.
characterDescription.faceShape: round face with full, prominent cheeks and a soft, undefined jawline. Forehead is average height.
characterDescription.nose: small, slightly upturned nose with a rounded tip. The bridge of the nose is narrow.
characterDescription.lips: full, pink lips with a slightly darker pink vermilion border. The upper lip is slightly thinner than the lower lip. The cupid's bow is not well-defined.
characterDescription.smile: lips are held in a neutral, non-smiling expression. Teeth are not visible.
characterDescription.eyebrows: medium-thick eyebrows, slightly arched shape. They are a shade lighter than the hair color, a light chestnut brown, and well-maintained.
characterDescription.ears: medium-sized ears, positioned normally on the head. Earlobes are attached.
characterDescription.cheeks: full, round cheeks with a natural rosiness, especially prominent under the eyes. No dimples are visible.
characterDescription.chin: rounded, soft chin with a slight double chin visible due to posture.
characterDescription.facialProportions: relatively large eyes in proportion to the rest of the face. The nose and mouth are smaller and delicate in comparison.
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Slightly prominent blue veins visible under the eyes. Small freckles or moles are not visible. There appears to be a small area of blue ink on the childâ€™s left hand.
characterDescription.overallImpression: sweet and innocent appearance with soft, baby-faced features. Her expression is slightly serious and thoughtful.
characterDescription.fullDescription: This young girl, estimated to be 5-6 years old, has a round face, full rosy cheeks and fair skin with pink undertones. Her bright sky blue eyes are large and almond-shaped, framing a small, slightly upturned nose. Her medium chestnut brown hair is styled in two high pigtail buns with pink clips adorned with white pom-poms, with loose, fine curls framing her face. She has full pink lips and medium-thick eyebrows. The subtle blue veins under her eyes and slight double chin are noticeable unique features.
